trans-unit.source: Welocalize founded in 1997, and is a privately held, and is a privately held,venture backed company 2 2.

trans-unit.source: We Welocalize have over 400 staff members in 12 offices located in the USA, USA, Ireland, Germany, The Netherlands, China Ireland, Germany, The Netherlands, China and Japan 3 3.

trans-unit.source: Welocalize For the past eight years running, Deloitte & Touche has ranked Welocalize as one of the fastest growing technology companies in North America in their annual Maryland Technology Fast 50 ranking ing.

trans-unit.source: Our services include globalization consulting, translation, localization, and testing solutions for business materials and systems including software, multimedia, learning services, and mobile applications.
trans-unit.target: Our services include globalization consulting, translation, localization, and testing solutions for business materials and systems including software, multimedia, learning services, and mobile applications.

trans-unit.source: Welocalize specializes in the Enterprise Applications, eLearning, Life Sciences, and Media & Telecommunications industries.
trans-unit.target: Welocalize specializes in the Enterprise Applications, eLearning, Life Sciences, and Media & Telecommunications industries.

trans-unit.source: We work with our clients to create a framework and methodology for expanding globally that produce scalable, predictable results.
trans-unit.target: We work with our clients to create a framework and methodology for expanding globally that produce scalable, predictable results.

trans-unit.source: With the integration of our product and service family into the development environment, our clients are able to achieve much faster international time-to-market.
trans-unit.target: With the integration of our product and service family into the development environment, our clients are able to achieve much faster international time-to-market.

trans-unit.source: Welocalize also offers the unique, open-source Translation Management System - GlobalSight.
trans-unit.target: Welocalize also offers the unique, open-source Translation Management System - GlobalSight.

trans-unit.source: About GlobalSight:
trans-unit.target: About GlobalSight:

trans-unit.source: GlobalSight is a collaborative, open source initiative to develop a flexible and sustainable Translation Management System (TMS) that leverages the best ideas and addresses the true needs of the industry.
trans-unit.target: GlobalSight is a collaborative, open source initiative to develop a flexible and sustainable Translation Management System (TMS) that leverages the best ideas and addresses the true needs of the industry.

trans-unit.source: GlobalSight embraces an ecosystem of enterprise clients, translators, language service providers, technology suppliers, universities, research institutions and individuals alike!
trans-unit.target: GlobalSight embraces an ecosystem of enterprise clients, translators, language service providers, technology suppliers, universities, research institutions and individuals alike!
